channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13878] Vectorization: Column pruning for Text vectorization
item.description: Column pruning in TextFile vectorization does not work with Vector SerDe settings due to LazySimple deser codepath issues.
item.summary: Vectorization: Column pruning for Text vectorization

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12827963 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build
Test failures are unrelated.

Got rid of fields warnings in DeserializedRead. With read optimization only reading through last include column, the warnings didn't make sense anymore. There is a new method for checking if all fields have been read used by the unit tests.

LGTM - +1 tests pending.

Ran simple plain-text runs for Query55 on 1000 scale unpartitioned TPC-DS.

The fact table decodes 2,878,132,226 rows, on a single machine.

1,201 seconds (unvectorized baseline) vs 305 with this patch - so approx ~4x gains when joins are present.
